scripts.build: npm run build:js && npx webpack && npm run build:gh-pages && echo "âœ… Build completed"
scripts.build:dist: npm run build && cp README.MD dist/README.md && npm run build:dist:pack && cp -R js dist/js && cp -R dist/. ../dist
scripts.build:pinbowl: npm run build && cp -R js/. ../../../services/pinbowl/src/taggedjs && cd ../../../services/pinbowl/taggedjs
scripts.save:dist: npm run patch:version && npm run build:dist && git add . && git commit -m "dist patch" && git push
scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m "patch" && git push
scripts.publish: npm run build:dist && npm run save:dist && cd ../dist && npm publish
